first_reasoning: We should allocate the full $10 million to the Industrial Products Division because upgrading controls and sensor packages on our high-volume CNC line delivers a rapid, measurable payback in the form of reduced downtime and lower operating costs. That quick win will not only improve margins within a quarter but also build momentum and free up capital to tackle longer-term alloy developments afterward.
